content: the t-rex backpack buddy is the perfectly-sized amigurumi dinosaur for hanging on a child s backpack it works up quickly and can be easily customized to be made in your child s favourite colour or in a colour to match their backpack the t-rex wears a functional backpack so that parents/caregivers can send notes to school with the child with their t-rex friend acting as a messenger makes a great gift for back-to-school or as a stocking stuffer **ad-free pdf versions of the pattern are available in my ravelry shop or** **here** https //www etsy
